hammer.api

Interface Container.BindingInvocation<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type that is being configured
    Enclosing interface:
    Container

    public static interface Container.BindingInvocation<T>
    A Container.BindingInvocation is a configuration entity used to configure the binding of an implementation type or instance that has been added to a Container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Container.ListMemberBinder<T> asListMemberBinding()
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable List that is not bound to any scope.
      Container.ListMemberBinder<T> asListMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable List that is bound to the given scope.
      Container.MapMemberBinder<T> asMapMemberBinding()
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Map that is not bound to any scope.
      Container.MapMemberBinder<T> asMapMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Map that is bound to the given scope.
      Container.SetMemberBinder<T> asSetMemberBinding()
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Set that is not bound to any scope.
      Container.SetMemberBinder<T> asSetMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
      Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Set that is bound to the given scope.
      Container.StrictBinder<T> asStrictBinding()
      Configure this type as a standard strict type binding.

    • Method Detail

      • asStrictBinding

        Container.StrictBinder<T> asStrictBinding()
        Configure this type as a standard strict type binding.
        Returns:
        a Container.StrictBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asMapMemberBinding

        Container.MapMemberBinder<T> asMapMemberBinding()
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Map that is not bound to any scope. The resulting injectable Map type will be treated as if the instantiated type is not annotated with any scope.

        This call is equivalent to the call asMapMemberBinding(null)

        Returns:
        a Container.MapMemberBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asMapMemberBinding

        Container.MapMemberBinder<T> asMapMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Map that is bound to the given scope. The will be treated as if the instantiated type is annotated with the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope to bind the map type to
        Returns:
        a Container.MapMemberBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asListMemberBinding

        Container.ListMemberBinder<T> asListMemberBinding()
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable List that is not bound to any scope. The resulting injectable List type will be treated as if the instantiated type is not annotated with any scope.

        This call is equivalent to the call asListMemberBinding(null)

        Returns:
        a Container.ListMemberBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asListMemberBinding

        Container.ListMemberBinder<T> asListMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable List that is bound to the given scope. The will be treated as if the instantiated type is annotated with the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope to bind the map type to
        Returns:
        a Container.ListMemberBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asSetMemberBinding

        Container.SetMemberBinder<T> asSetMemberBinding()
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Set that is not bound to any scope. The resulting injectable Set type will be treated as if the instantiated type is not annotated with any scope.

        This call is equivalent to the call asSetMemberBinding(null)

        Returns:
        a Container.SetMemberBinder used to further configure the binding

      • asSetMemberBinding

        Container.SetMemberBinder<T> asSetMemberBinding(Annotation scope)
        Configure this type as a binding to a member of an injectable Set that is bound to the given scope. The will be treated as if the instantiated type is annotated with the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope to bind the map type to
        Returns:
        a Container.SetMemberBinder used to further configure the binding
